title: This nation is 'sinking' because of climate change. Residents are pleading for help.
content:
1. This nation is 'sinking' because of climate change. Residents are pleading for help.  USA TODAY
  2. Tuvalu seeks to retain statehood if it sinks completely as sea levels rise  The Guardian
  3. At COP26, Tuvalu pushes for underwater sovereignty  The Washington Post
  4. His country is sinking. So he’s rolling up his pants to make the point at climate summit.  Yahoo News
  5. At COP26, island nations at risk from climate change struggle to make the point  NBC News
contentSnippet:
This nation is 'sinking' because of climate change. Residents are pleading for help.  USA TODAY
Tuvalu seeks to retain statehood if it sinks completely as sea levels rise  The Guardian
At COP26, Tuvalu pushes for underwater sovereignty  The Washington Post
His country is sinking. So he’s rolling up his pants to make the point at climate summit.  Yahoo News
At COP26, island nations at risk from climate change struggle to make the point  NBC News

localize.title: この国は気候変動のために「沈没」している。住民たちは助けを求めています。
由于气候变化，这个国家正在 "沉没"。居民们正在恳求帮助。
由於氣候變化，這個國家正在 "沉沒"。居民們正在懇求幫助。
